Text: Cheers 4 the upload. I was really looking 4ward 2 this but Sweetheart has dropped the ball here. This is possibly their worst release.

I don't agree with the first comment; I found this to be nearly on par with Sweetheart's Girls Kissing Girls series, which--according to my "criteria"--remains one of the best series from one of the best lesbian studios out there.  We all, however, do have differing criterias.  :)  Thanks for the UL!
